trends.finding: Strong preference for Ollama-based local LLMs across 90% of projects surveyed
D&D 5e rulebook RAG implementations using LangChain/LlamaIndex + vector DBs
TTS/STT features appearing in newer projects for session immersion
Python for backend LLM work, React/TS for frontend interfaces

recommendations.text: Foundry VTT module opportunity - current tools lack VTT integration
Shared D&D 5e corpus dataset opportunity to reduce fragmentation
Multi-agent architecture for deep NPC interactions

next_steps: Phase 3 synthesizer should compare AI-DM findings with devtools/ai-llm for cross-domain insights
